title: Picnic / Barbecue Area, Patio / Balcony, Faux Wood Flooring
posting_body: ['Infinity Flats', 'Completely remodeled in September 2011, Infinity Flats offers large one and two-bedroom apartments loaded with brand new black appliances, hardwood floors, and fire places.', 'Relax by the resort style pool, soak in the outdoor hot tub, exercise in the state of the art fitness center, play fetch with Fido in the custom dog park, or simply unwind by your wood burning fireplace.', 'Infinity Flats is located just east of Cherry Creek Mall, providing easy access to some of Denver’s best shopping, dining, and entertainment.', 'The Colorado Blvd Light Rail Station is less than a mile away, offering convenient access to downtown Denver, Mile High Stadium, The Pepsi Center, and the Tech Center.', 'Fireplace', 'Microwave', 'On-Site Laundry Facilities', 'Tiled Backsplash', 'Hot Tub', 'Patio / Balcony', 'Guest Parking', 'Fitness Center', 'Dog Park with "Doggy Pool"', 'Vaulted Ceilings', 'Pet Friendly', 'Controlled Access Buildings', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
